dt.t: Ever {wi}decorous{/wi}, she periodically excuses herself to another room rather than allow a guest to witness her blowing her nose.

et: Latin {it}decorus{/it}, from {it}decor{/it} beauty, grace; akin to Latin {it}decēre{/it} to be fitting {ma}{mat|decent|}{/ma}
shortdef: marked by propriety and good taste : correct
